description: The holidays are just around the corner, and what better way to celebrate than with a Peppermint Bark Mimosa Recipe? This recipe is so easy. You can whip it up in less than five minutes!
name: Peppermint Bark Mimosa
recipeIngredient: ½ oz. Creme de Cacao (the clear kind)
1 Bottle of Sparkling wine, Champagne, or Prosecco
Candy canes, crush some for the garnish, and set aside the whole ones

recipeInstructions.name: Dip the champagne flute to the melted chocolate until the rim is coated. Dip into the crushed candy canes.
recipeInstructions.text: Dip the champagne flute to the melted chocolate until the rim is coated. Dip into the crushed candy canes.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the vodka into the glass, followed by the Creme de Cacao.

recipeInstructions.name: Top the glass with Prosecco and garnish with the candy canes before serving.
